interactions:
Kayako - ticket id 60005331 // Ciprian Nastase commented publicly: Dear Kris,
 
As far as I understand, you are already in contact with the GFI team for this DOA case. In light of this, we will proceed to close the ticket.

Should you have further questions related to GFI - Kerio Control, please do not hesitate to submit an additional support request and we will be happy to assist!
 
Please take a moment to tell us about your support experience; you'll be invited to our short survey in a separate email.
 
Best regards,
Ciprian Nastase
GFI - Kerio Control Support Team

Kayako - ticket id 60005331 // Jozef Kacala commented privately:  Hi team, 

 this can be closed,  we are in contact with Kris and Apligo and Apligo is dealing with RMA directly as its DOA. so no action is needed here. 

 thanks

Kayako - ticket id 60005331 // Ciprian Nastase commented publicly: Dear Kris,
 
Thank you for contacting GFI - Kerio Control Support, I understand that you are requesting an RMA for a hardware NG510 device.

Please accept my sincere apologies for the delay in getting back to you, I have now marked the ticket as urgent.
 
While we do the preliminary checks on our side, please note that we will also need a video showcasing the issue (even if it is a no-power condition). As indicated in Requesting RMA for hardware box - KerioControl [https://support.keriocontrol.gfi.com/article/120394-requesting-rma-for-hardware-box], It is required to provide a video of the physical problem or unexpected behavior. 

Once you get back to us, we will be able to continue working on the ticket.

Best regards,
Ciprian Nastase
GFI - Kerio Control Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60005331 // Jan Paraniak commented publicly: Dear Kris,

Thank you for reaching out.

To enable us to verify the request and optionally proceed with the RMA process for your hardware unit, please follow the steps outlined in the following article:
Requesting RMA for Hardware Box [https://support.keriocontrol.gfi.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017701059-Requesting-RMA-for-hardware-box]

If you have any further questions or need additional assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We're here to help.

Best regards,
GFI - Kerio Control Support Team
